user_question: How do I build a simple telescope at home and generate an image of a homemade telescope?
final_answer: To build a simple telescope at home, you need two lenses: one with a long focal length (objective lens) and one with a short focal length (eyepiece lens), a cardboard tube, and some tape. Image of a homemade telescope generated. The magnification is calculated by dividing the focal length of the objective lens by the focal length of the eyepiece lens.
